word: Oh, that we might comprehend more fully the infinite price that has been paid for our redemption! Paul declares, "Ye are bought with a price"; and it is true, for the price paid is nothing less than the life of the only begotten Son of God. Let us all consider this. We may refuse the invitations that Christ sends to us; we may neglect His offer of pardon and peace; but still it remains a fact that every one of us has been bought with a price, even with the precious blood of the Son of God. Therefore, "Consider Him" [Hebrews 12:3].
